1.0.name: wordpress/missing-data-all-in-one-seo-pack
1.0.description:
The "Missing Data - All In One SEO Pack" Add-on, is a plugin which can be used with the "All in One SEO Pack" plugin. The "Missing Data - All In One SEO Pack" add-on searches your published posts and pages, that don't contain a Title, Meta Description and Keywords. This can be very useful for users to find posts and pages, they missed adding such details too. The plugin performs a search and displays a list of posts and pages and highlights the details that are missing and offers a link using which the user can easily edit the posts/pages in concern. Furthermore, this is much more efficient than manually searching through hundreds of your blog posts!

Check out some of the other WordPress plugins by the same author.
